node.address: La Despensa, Juanchaco, Buenaventura. , Buenaventura, Colombia

content.value:
We have a beautiful social area with restaurant, bar and outdoor amenities to enjoy the breath-taking view of this private paradise. The rooms are inside the Jungle in between the trees looking to the sea, we have full bathrooms running on rain water and a little veggie garden we are starting.

General:
- 24 hours Reception (flexible time)
- It is not allowed to bring alcohol to the Hostel
- No curfew.
- We do not accept customers younger than 18 years of age.
- Pet friendly.
- Taxes not included for Colombians, 19% of IVA.
The First Backpacker Hostel inside the Bahia Malaga National Park in the Colombian Pacific Coast

- Just 3 hours from Cali
- Private Beach, No Tourists.
The First Backpacker Hostel inside the Bahia Malaga National Park in the Colombian Pacific Coast

- Just 3 hours from Cali
 Sleep in th middle of the Jungle

description.description: Pacifico Hostel is located in a huge natural reserve on a cliff surrounded by more than 70.000 metres of virgin tropical jungle and amazing untouched beaches. We are the only property with a private beach and located inside the National Park. As the tides come and go, navigate the jungle by swimming, kayaking or hiking. Inside, youll find mangroves, waterfalls, natural pools, and by night, swim together to find fluorescent plankton inside the nearby caves.
